# 3. Azure Container Registry (ACR)

### 3.1. Create ACR
```bash
az acr create \
  --resource-group marketflow-rg \
  --name marketflowregistry \
  --sku Basic \
  --admin-enabled true
```
```json
 {
  "adminUserEnabled": true,
  "anonymousPullEnabled": false,
  "autoGeneratedDomainNameLabelScope": "Unsecure",
  "creationDate": "2025-10-27T05:59:50.202250+00:00",
  "dataEndpointEnabled": false,
  "dataEndpointHostNames": [],
  "encryption": {
    "keyVaultProperties": null,
    "status": "disabled"
  },
  "id": "/subscriptions/65fe7e97-9f6f-4f82-b940-4f374ca027cb/resourceGroups/marketflow-rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerRegistry/registries/marketflowregistry",
  "identity": null,
  "location": "westeurope",
  "loginServer": "marketflowregistry.azurecr.io",
  "metadataSearch": "Disabled",
  "name": "marketflowregistry",
  "networkRuleBypassOptions": "AzureServices",
  "networkRuleSet": null,
  "policies": {
    "azureAdAuthenticationAsArmPolicy": {
      "status": "enabled"
    },
    "exportPolicy": {
      "status": "enabled"
    },
    "quarantinePolicy": {
      "status": "disabled"
    },
    "retentionPolicy": {
      "days": 7,
      "lastUpdatedTime": "2025-10-27T06:00:03.932688+00:00",
      "status": "disabled"
    },
    "softDeletePolicy": {
      "lastUpdatedTime": "2025-10-27T06:00:03.932728+00:00",
      "retentionDays": 7,
      "status": "disabled"
    },
    "trustPolicy": {
      "status": "disabled",
      "type": "Notary"
    }
  },
  "privateEndpointConnections": [],
  "provisioningState": "Succeeded",
  "publicNetworkAccess": "Enabled",
  "resourceGroup": "marketflow-rg",
  "roleAssignmentMode": "LegacyRegistryPermissions",
  "sku": {
    "name": "Basic",
    "tier": "Basic"
  },
  "status": null,
  "systemData": {
    "createdAt": "2025-10-27T05:59:50.202250+00:00",
    "createdBy": "oleh.kondracki@gmail.com",
    "createdByType": "User",
    "lastModifiedAt": "2025-10-27T05:59:50.202250+00:00",
    "lastModifiedBy": "oleh.kondracki@gmail.com",
    "lastModifiedByType": "User"
  },
  "tags": {},
  "type": "Microsoft.ContainerRegistry/registries",
  "zoneRedundancy": "Disabled"
}
```

### 3.2. List ACR
```bash
az acr list --resource-group marketflow-rg --output table
```
```text
NAME                RESOURCE GROUP    LOCATION    SKU    LOGIN SERVER                   CREATION DATE         ADMIN ENABLED
------------------  ----------------  ----------  -----  -----------------------------  --------------------  ---------------
marketflowregistry  marketflow-rg     westeurope  Basic  marketflowregistry.azurecr.io  2025-10-27T05:59:50Z  True
```

### 3.3. Login to ACR
```bash
az acr login --name marketflowregistry
```
```
Login Succeeded
```

### 3.4. Docker Config
```bash
cat ~/.docker/config.json
```

```json
{
        "auths": {
                "ghcr.io": {

}
```
